law.catch_line: Military property -- Loss, damage, destruction, or wrongful disposition.
law.text:
Any person subject to this code shall be punished as a court-martial may direct, if that person, without proper authority:
Sells or otherwise disposes of;
Willfully or through neglect damages, destroy, or loses; or
Willfully or through neglect suffers to be lost, damaged, destroyed, sold, or wrongfully disposed of; any military property of the United States or of any state.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 111, effective June 25, 2013.
